message.content:
# Claude Code Prompt: Modern BOS-ARSA Homepage

## Context

Build a modern, single-page homepage for **BOS-ARSA** (√ñsterreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Beh√∂rden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben ‚Äî BOS-Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria). This is an Austrian amateur radio club specifically for members of police, fire, rescue, and other public safety organizations (BOS = Beh√∂rden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben).

The current website (https://bos-arsa.at/) is a basic WordPress page with minimal design. We need a **professional, modern, authoritative** replacement that conveys trust, precision, and the dual identity of emergency services + amateur radio.

## Tech Stack

- **Single HTML file** with inline CSS and minimal JS (no build tools needed)
- Use Google Fonts via CDN
- Use Lucide Icons or similar via CDN
- Responsive design (mobile-first)
- German language throughout

## Color Palette ‚Äî "Police Blue" Theme

Inspired by Austrian police/BOS emergency services aesthetics. Use these as the primary palette:

```
--bos-navy:        #0A1628;    /* Deep navy ‚Äî header, footer, hero background */
--bos-blue:        #003DA5;    /* Austrian police blue ‚Äî primary brand color */
--bos-blue-light:  #1A5FC7;    /* Lighter interactive blue ‚Äî buttons, links */
--bos-blue-bright: #2E7DE6;    /* Bright accent ‚Äî hover states, highlights */
--bos-silver:      #C0C8D4;    /* Cool silver ‚Äî borders, subtle text */
--bos-gold:        #C9A84C;    /* Authority gold ‚Äî accents, badges, star elements */
--bos-white:       #F0F2F5;    /* Cool off-white ‚Äî backgrounds */
--bos-red:         #CC2936;    /* Emergency red ‚Äî alerts, important callouts */
--bos-dark:        #0D1B2A;    /* Near-black ‚Äî text */
--bos-gray:        #374151;    /* Body text */
```

Additional design tokens:
- Subtle blue gradient overlays on hero section
- Dark backgrounds with light text for header/footer (authoritative feel)
- Gold accents sparingly for badges and important highlights
- Red only for emergency/CTA elements

## Design Direction

**Aesthetic: Authoritative & Technical ‚Äî like a modern government agency site meets radio operations center**

- Clean, structured grid layout with sharp edges (no rounded corners > 4px)
- Subtle geometric patterns or radio wave motifs as background textures
- Strong typography hierarchy with a condensed/bold display font
- Professional photography placeholders (use gradient placeholders with radio/emergency icons)
- Subtle animations on scroll (fade-in sections)
- Dark hero section transitioning to lighter content areas

## Page Structure & Content

### 1. Navigation Bar (sticky)
- BOS-ARSA logo area (left) ‚Äî use text "BOS-ARSA" with a shield/radio icon
- Nav links: √úber uns | Vorstand | Ziele | Mitglied werden | Kontakt
- Compact, dark background (`--bos-navy`)

### 2. Hero Section
- Full-width dark section with subtle radio wave animation or geometric pattern overlay
- Main headline: **"Amateurfunk im Dienst der Sicherheit"**
- Subtitle: "Der √∂sterreichische Amateurfunkverein der Beh√∂rden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben"
- Two CTA buttons: "Mitglied werden" (gold/bright) and "Mehr erfahren" (outline)
- Subtle animated radio wave or signal pulse effect

### 3. "√úber uns" Section
- Brief intro paragraph about BOS-ARSA
- Text: "Der Verein bezweckt die Erhaltung, F√∂rderung und Verbreitung des Amateurfunkwesens innerhalb des Wirkungsbereiches der Beh√∂rden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS)."
- 3 feature cards in a row:
  - üõ°Ô∏è **Sicherheit** ‚Äî "Amateurfunk als verl√§ssliche Kommunikation f√ºr BOS-Organisationen"
  - üì° **Vernetzung** ‚Äî "Verbindung von Funkamateuren aus Polizei, Feuerwehr und Rettung"
  - üéì **Ausbildung** ‚Äî "F√∂rderung der Amateurfunk-Kompetenz im BOS-Bereich"

### 4. "Vorstand" Section (Board Members)
- Clean card grid layout
- Members with role, name, and a subtle rank/badge indicator:
  - **Pr√§sident** ‚Äî Gabrutsch Wolfgang, BA MBA MBA DBA
  - **Generalsekret√§r** ‚Äî Londer Erich, BA
  - **Kassier** ‚Äî Ing. Ren√© Camaur
  - **Kassier Stellvertreter** ‚Äî Joham Thomas
  - **Schriftf√ºhrer** ‚Äî Kugi J√ºrgen
  - **Schriftf√ºhrer Stellvertreter** ‚Äî Weger Erwin
- Use gold accent on the role label, shield/star icons for president

### 5. "Ziele" (Goals) Section
- Dark background section for contrast
- Main goal text prominently displayed
- Icon list of key objectives:
  - F√∂rderung des Amateurfunks in BOS-Organisationen
  - Ausbildung und Weiterbildung von Funkamateuren
  - Zusammenarbeit mit nationalen und internationalen Organisationen
  - Unterst√ºtzung der Notfallkommunikation

### 6. "Mitglied werden" (Join) Section
- Eye-catching section with gold/blue gradient accent
- Headline: "Werde Teil unseres Teams"
- Subtext: "Du bist in einer BOS-Organisation t√§tig und hast eine Amateurfunklizenz? Dann bist du bei uns richtig!"
- Requirements listed cleanly:
  - T√§tigkeit in einer BOS-Organisation (Polizei, Feuerwehr, Rettung, Bundesheer, etc.)
  - G√ºltige Amateurfunklizenz
- CTA button: "Kontakt aufnehmen" ‚Üí mailto:office@bos-arsa.at

### 7. "Partner" Section
- Small section showing support:
- "Mit freundlicher Unterst√ºtzung von:"
- safeREACH.com logo area (placeholder)
- Link to BOS-ARSA Logging Tool: bosarsalog.oeradio.at

### 8. Footer
- Dark (`--bos-navy`) footer
- Impressum data:
  - √ñsterreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Beh√∂rden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben ‚Äì BOS-Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria (BOS-ARSA)
  - c/o Wolfgang Gabrutsch
  - Zust√§ndige Vereinsbeh√∂rde: Landespolizeidirektion K√§rnten
  - 9020 Klagenfurt am W√∂rthersee, Buchengasse 3
  - ZVR-Zahl: 1783847541
  - office@bos-arsa.at
- Copyright line: ¬© 2025 BOS-ARSA. Alle Rechte vorbehalten.

## Design Details

### Typography
- Display/Headlines: **"Barlow Condensed"** (bold, condensed ‚Äî military/tactical feel) or similar condensed sans-serif
- Body text: **"Source Sans 3"** (clean, professional, highly readable)
- Monospace for any technical/callsign displays: **"JetBrains Mono"**

### Key Visual Elements
- Thin gold line separators between sections
- Shield icon motif (combining radio waves + BOS authority)
- Subtle CSS radio wave animation (concentric expanding circles, low opacity) in the hero
- Card hover effects with subtle blue glow
- Section entrance animations (fade-up on scroll using IntersectionObserver)

### Responsive Behavior
- Desktop: Full grid layouts, horizontal nav
- Tablet: 2-column grids, same nav
- Mobile: Single column, hamburger menu, stacked cards

## Important Notes

- All text in **German**
- The tone should be **professional, authoritative, trustworthy** ‚Äî this represents law enforcement and emergency service professionals
- Avoid anything playful or casual ‚Äî this is a serious organization
- The blue color scheme should feel like Austrian police / Bundesheer official communications
- Include proper HTML meta tags (charset, viewport, description, Open Graph basics)
- Ensure accessibility: proper heading hierarchy, alt texts, sufficient contrast ratios, focus states
- The page should feel like it could represent a real government-adjacent organization, not a hobby club

## File Output

Create a single `index.html` file that is self-contained and can be deployed to any static hosting (Cloudflare Pages, GitHub Pages, etc.).

content.text: I'll build this professional BOS-ARSA homepage. Let me start by creating the single-file HTML page with all the specified requirements.

input.subject: Build BOS-ARSA modern homepage
input.description: Create a single index.html file with inline CSS/JS for the BOS-ARSA Austrian amateur radio club. Must include: sticky nav, hero with radio wave animation, about section, board members, goals, membership, partners, and footer. Police blue theme, German language, responsive design, scroll animations.

content.content: Task #1 created successfully: Build BOS-ARSA modern homepage

input.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="de">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>BOS-ARSA ‚Äî Amateurfunk im Dienst der Sicherheit</title>
  <meta name="description" content="√ñsterreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Beh√∂rden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben ‚Äì BOS-Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria">
  <meta property="og:title" content="BOS-ARSA ‚Äî Amateurfunk im Dienst der Sicherheit">
  <meta property="og:description" content="Der √∂sterreichische Amateurfunkverein der Beh√∂rden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben.">
  <meta property="og:type" content="website">
  <meta property="og:url" content="https://bos-arsa.at/">
  <meta property="og:locale" content="de_AT">
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Barlow+Condensed:wght@400;600;700;800&family=Source+Sans+3:wght@300;400;500;600;700&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
  <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest"></script>
  <style>
    /* ===== CSS Reset & Custom Properties ===== */
    *, *::before, *::after {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    :root {
      --bos-navy:        #0A1628;
      --bos-blue:        #003DA5;
      --bos-blue-light:  #1A5FC7;
      --bos-blue-bright: #2E7DE6;
      --bos-silver:      #C0C8D4;
      --bos-gold:        #C9A84C;
      --bos-white:       #F0F2F5;
      --bos-red:         #CC2936;
      --bos-dark:        #0D1B2A;
      --bos-gray:        #374151;

      --font-display: 'Barlow Condensed', 'Arial Narrow', sans-serif;
      --font-body: 'Source Sans 3', 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif;
      --font-mono: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace;

      --container: 1200px;
      --nav-height: 64px;
    }

    html {
      scroll-behavior: smooth;
      scroll-padding-top: var(--nav-height);
    }

    body {
      font-family: var(--font-body);
      color: var(--bos-dark);
      background: var(--bos-white);
      line-height: 1.6;
      -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
      -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    }

    img {
      max-width: 100%;
      display: block;
    }

    a {
      color: var(--bos-blue-light);
      text-decoration: none;
      transition: color 0.2s;
    }

    a:hover {
      color: var(--bos-blue-bright);
    }

    a:focus-visible {
      outline: 2px solid var(--bos-blue-bright);
      outline-offset: 2px;
    }

    .container {
      max-width: var(--container);
      margin: 0 auto;
      padding: 0 24px;
    }

    /* ===== Section Divider ===== */
    .section-divider {
      width: 60px;
      height: 2px;
      background: var(--bos-gold);
      margin: 16px auto 0;
    }

    .section-divider--left {
      margin-left: 0;
    }

    /* ===== Scroll Animations ===== */
    .reveal {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(30px);
      transition: opacity 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.22, 1, 0.36, 1), transform 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.22, 1, 0.36, 1);
    }

    .reveal.visible {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0);
    }

    /* ===== Navigation ===== */
    .nav {
      position: fixed;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      z-index: 1000;
      background: var(--bos-navy);
      border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.1);
      height: var(--nav-height);
      transition: box-shadow 0.3s;
    }

    .nav.scrolled {
      box-shadow: 0 2px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
    }

    .nav__inner {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: space-between;
      height: 100%;
    }

    .nav__brand {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 10px;
      color: #fff;
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-weight: 800;
      font-size: 1.4rem;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      text-decoration: none;
    }

    .nav__brand:hover {
      color: #fff;
    }

    .nav__brand-icon {
      position: relative;
      width: 38px;
      height: 38px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bos-blue), var(--bos-blue-light));
      border: 1px solid var(--bos-gold);
      border-radius: 3px;
    }

    .nav__brand-icon i {
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .nav__links {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 8px;
      list-style: none;
    }

    .nav__links a {
      display: block;
      padding: 8px 14px;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      font-family: var(--font-body);
      font-size: 0.9rem;
      font-weight: 500;
      letter-spacing: 0.3px;
      transition: color 0.2s, background 0.2s;
      border-radius: 3px;
      text-decoration: none;
    }

    .nav__links a:hover,
    .nav__links a:focus-visible {
      color: #fff;
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
    }

    /* Hamburger */
    .nav__hamburger {
      display: none;
      flex-direction: column;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 5px;
      width: 36px;
      height: 36px;
      background: none;
      border: none;
      cursor: pointer;
      padding: 4px;
    }

    .nav__hamburger span {
      display: block;
      width: 100%;
      height: 2px;
      background: var(--bos-silver);
      transition: transform 0.3s, opacity 0.3s;
    }

    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(1) {
      transform: translateY(7px) rotate(45deg);
    }

    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(2) {
      opacity: 0;
    }

    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(3) {
      transform: translateY(-7px) rotate(-45deg);
    }

    /* ===== Hero Section ===== */
    .hero {
      position: relative;
      min-height: 100vh;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(160deg, var(--bos-navy) 0%, #0e2240 40%, var(--bos-blue) 100%);
      overflow: hidden;
      padding: calc(var(--nav-height) + 40px) 24px 80px;
    }

    /* Geometric grid pattern overlay */
    .hero__pattern {
      position: absolute;
      inset: 0;
      opacity: 0.04;
      background-image:
        linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px),
        linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px);
      background-size: 60px 60px;
    }

    /* Radio wave animation */
    .hero__waves {
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    .hero__wave {
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      left: 50%;
      width: 200px;
      height: 200px;
      margin-top: -100px;
      margin-left: -100px;
      border: 1px solid rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.15);
      border-radius: 50%;
      animation: wave-expand 4s ease-out infinite;
    }

    .hero__wave:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 1s; }
    .hero__wave:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 2s; }
    .hero__wave:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 3s; }

    @keyframes wave-expand {
      0% {
        width: 200px;
        height: 200px;
        margin-top: -100px;
        margin-left: -100px;
        opacity: 0.5;
      }
      100% {
        width: 1200px;
        height: 1200px;
        margin-top: -600px;
        margin-left: -600px;
        opacity: 0;
      }
    }

    .hero__content {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 2;
      text-align: center;
      max-width: 820px;
    }

    .hero__badge {
      display: inline-flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 8px;
      padding: 6px 16px;
      background: rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.12);
      border: 1px solid rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.25);
      border-radius: 3px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.78rem;
      letter-spacing: 2px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      margin-bottom: 28px;
    }

    .hero__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(2.4rem, 6vw, 4.2rem);
      font-weight: 800;
      color: #fff;
      line-height: 1.1;
      letter-spacing: -0.5px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .hero__title span {
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .hero__subtitle {
      font-size: clamp(1rem, 2vw, 1.2rem);
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      font-weight: 300;
      line-height: 1.6;
      max-width: 640px;
      margin: 0 auto 40px;
    }

    .hero__actions {
      display: flex;
      gap: 16px;
      justify-content: center;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
    }

    /* ===== Buttons ===== */
    .btn {
      display: inline-flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 8px;
      padding: 14px 32px;
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      border: 2px solid transparent;
      border-radius: 3px;
      cursor: pointer;
      transition: all 0.25s;
      text-decoration: none;
    }

    .btn:focus-visible {
      outline: 2px solid var(--bos-blue-bright);
      outline-offset: 2px;
    }

    .btn--primary {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bos-gold), #d4b35a);
      color: var(--bos-navy);
      border-color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .btn--primary:hover {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #d4b35a, #dfc06e);
      color: var(--bos-navy);
      transform: translateY(-2px);
      box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.3);
    }

    .btn--outline {
      background: transparent;
      color: #fff;
      border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    }

    .btn--outline:hover {
      border-color: #fff;
      color: #fff;
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
      transform: translateY(-2px);
    }

    .btn--blue {
      background: var(--bos-blue-light);
      color: #fff;
      border-color: var(--bos-blue-light);
    }

    .btn--blue:hover {
      background: var(--bos-blue-bright);
      border-color: var(--bos-blue-bright);
      color: #fff;
      transform: translateY(-2px);
      box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(46, 125, 230, 0.3);
    }

    /* ===== Section Shared Styles ===== */
    .section {
      padding: 100px 0;
    }

    .section--dark {
      background: linear-gradient(160deg, var(--bos-dark), var(--bos-navy));
      color: #fff;
    }

    .section__header {
      text-align: center;
      margin-bottom: 64px;
    }

    .section__label {
      display: inline-block;
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.78rem;
      letter-spacing: 3px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      margin-bottom: 12px;
    }

    .section__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(1.8rem, 4vw, 2.6rem);
      font-weight: 800;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      line-height: 1.15;
    }

    .section--dark .section__title {
      color: #fff;
    }

    .section__intro {
      max-width: 700px;
      margin: 24px auto 0;
      color: var(--bos-gray);
      font-size: 1.08rem;
      line-height: 1.7;
      text-align: center;
    }

    .section--dark .section__intro {
      color: var(--bos-silver);
    }

    /* ===== About / Feature Cards ===== */
    .features {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
      gap: 28px;
    }

    .feature-card {
      background: #fff;
      border: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.4);
      border-radius: 4px;
      padding: 40px 32px;
      transition: transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s, border-color 0.3s;
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .feature-card::before {
      content: '';
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      height: 3px;
      background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--bos-blue), var(--bos-blue-bright));
      transform: scaleX(0);
      transform-origin: left;
      transition: transform 0.4s;
    }

    .feature-card:hover {
      transform: translateY(-4px);
      box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(10, 22, 40, 0.1), 0 0 0 1px rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.1);
      border-color: rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.2);
    }

    .feature-card:hover::before {
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }

    .feature-card__icon {
      width: 52px;
      height: 52px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 61, 165, 0.08), rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.08));
      border-radius: 4px;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      color: var(--bos-blue);
    }

    .feature-card__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1.3rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
      color: var(--bos-dark);
    }

    .feature-card__text {
      color: var(--bos-gray);
      font-size: 0.95rem;
      line-height: 1.65;
    }

    /* ===== Board / Vorstand Section ===== */
    .board-grid {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
      gap: 24px;
    }

    .board-card {
      background: #fff;
      border: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.4);
      border-radius: 4px;
      padding: 32px 28px;
      text-align: center;
      transition: transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;
      position: relative;
    }

    .board-card:hover {
      transform: translateY(-3px);
      box-shadow: 0 6px 24px rgba(10, 22, 40, 0.08);
    }

    .board-card--president {
      border-color: rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.3);
      background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.04), #fff);
    }

    .board-card__avatar {
      width: 64px;
      height: 64px;
      margin: 0 auto 18px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 61, 165, 0.06), rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.08));
      border-radius: 50%;
      color: var(--bos-blue);
    }

    .board-card--president .board-card__avatar {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.1), rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.15));
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      border: 2px solid rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.25);
    }

    .board-card__role {
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.72rem;
      letter-spacing: 2px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      margin-bottom: 8px;
      font-weight: 500;
    }

    .board-card__name {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1.2rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      color: var(--bos-dark);
      line-height: 1.3;
    }

    .board-card__credentials {
      font-size: 0.82rem;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      margin-top: 4px;
    }

    /* ===== Goals / Ziele Section ===== */
    .goals-content {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
      gap: 60px;
      align-items: center;
    }

    .goals__statement {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(1.4rem, 3vw, 1.9rem);
      font-weight: 700;
      color: #fff;
      line-height: 1.35;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 0.3px;
    }

    .goals__statement span {
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .goals-list {
      list-style: none;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 20px;
    }

    .goals-list__item {
      display: flex;
      align-items: flex-start;
      gap: 16px;
      padding: 20px;
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
      border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
      border-radius: 4px;
      transition: background 0.3s;
    }

    .goals-list__item:hover {
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.07);
    }

    .goals-list__icon {
      flex-shrink: 0;
      width: 40px;
      height: 40px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.1);
      border-radius: 4px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .goals-list__text {
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      font-size: 0.98rem;
      line-height: 1.55;
      padding-top: 8px;
    }

    /* ===== Join / Mitglied werden ===== */
    .join {
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .join__bg-accent {
      position: absolute;
      top: -50%;
      right: -20%;
      width: 600px;
      height: 600px;
      background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.06) 0%, transparent 70%);
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    .join-content {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
      gap: 60px;
      align-items: center;
      position: relative;
    }

    .join__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(1.8rem, 4vw, 2.4rem);
      font-weight: 800;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      color: var(--bos-dark);
      margin-bottom: 16px;
      line-height: 1.15;
    }

    .join__subtitle {
      color: var(--bos-gray);
      font-size: 1.08rem;
      line-height: 1.7;
      margin-bottom: 32px;
    }

    .join__requirements {
      list-style: none;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 14px;
      margin-bottom: 36px;
    }

    .join__requirement {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 12px;
      font-size: 0.98rem;
      color: var(--bos-gray);
    }

    .join__requirement i {
      color: var(--bos-blue-light);
      flex-shrink: 0;
    }

    .join__visual {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
    }

    .join__graphic {
      width: 100%;
      max-width: 400px;
      aspect-ratio: 1;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bos-navy), var(--bos-blue));
      border-radius: 4px;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 20px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .join__graphic::before {
      content: '';
      position: absolute;
      inset: 0;
      opacity: 0.05;
      background-image:
        linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px),
        linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px);
      background-size: 40px 40px;
    }

    .join__graphic-icon {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 1;
    }

    .join__graphic-text {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 1;
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1.4rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 2px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .join__graphic-sub {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 1;
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.78rem;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      letter-spacing: 1px;
    }

    /* ===== Partners ===== */
    .partners {
      background: #fff;
      border-top: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.3);
      border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.3);
    }

    .partners__label {
      text-align: center;
      font-size: 0.9rem;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      margin-bottom: 32px;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    }

    .partners-grid {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 48px;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
    }

    .partner-item {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 10px;
      padding: 24px 36px;
      border: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.3);
      border-radius: 4px;
      text-decoration: none;
      color: var(--bos-gray);

      font-size: 1.15rem;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
    }

    .partner-item__desc {
      font-size: 0.82rem;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
    }

    /* ===== Footer ===== */
    .footer {
      background: var(--bos-navy);
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      padding: 64px 0 0;
    }

    .footer__inner {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: 2fr 1fr;
      gap: 48px;
    }

    .footer__brand {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-weight: 800;
      font-size: 1.2rem;
      color: #fff;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 1px;

      align-items: center;
      gap: 10px;
    }

    .footer__brand-icon {
      display: flex;

      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .footer__org-name {
      font-size: 0.88rem;
      line-height: 1.65;
      color: rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.7);
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .footer__details {
      font-size: 0.85rem;
      line-height: 1.8;
      color: rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.6);
    }

    .footer__details a {
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .footer__details a:hover {
      color: #d4b35a;
    }

    .footer__links-title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-weight: 700;
      font-size: 0.95rem;
      color: #fff;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .footer__link-list {
      list-style: none;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 10px;
    }

    .footer__link-list a {
      color: rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.6);
      font-size: 0.88rem;
      transition: color 0.2s;
    }

    .footer__link-list a:hover {
      color: #fff;
    }

    .footer__bottom {
      margin-top: 48px;
      padding: 20px 0;
      border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: space-between;
      font-size: 0.8rem;
      color: rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.4);
    }

    /* ===== Mobile Responsive ===== */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
      .features {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
      }

      .board-grid {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
      }

      .goals-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        gap: 40px;
      }

      .goals__statement {
        text-align: center;
      }

      .join-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        gap: 40px;
      }

      .join__visual {

      }

      .join__graphic {
        max-width: 320px;
        aspect-ratio: 4/3;
      }

      .footer__inner {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
      }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {

      }

      .nav__links a {
        font-size: 1.05rem;
        padding: 14px 16px;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
      }

      .nav__hamburger {

      }

      .features {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
      }

      .board-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
      }

      .section {
        padding: 72px 0;

      .section__header {

      .hero {

            <li><a href="#ziele">Ziele</a></li>
            <li><a href="#mitglied">Mitglied werden</a></li>
            <li><a href="mailto:office@bos-arsa.at">Kontakt</a></li>
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="footer__bottom">
        <span>© 2025 BOS-ARSA. Alle Rechte vorbehalten.</span>
        <span>Amateurfunk im Dienst der Sicherheit</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </footer>

  <!-- ===== JavaScript ===== -->
  <script>
    // Initialize Lucide icons
    lucide.createIcons();

    // Sticky nav shadow on scroll
    const nav = document.getElementById('nav');
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      nav.classList.toggle('scrolled', window.scrollY > 20);
    }, { passive: true });

    // Mobile menu toggle
    const navToggle = document.getElementById('navToggle');
    const navLinks = document.getElementById('navLinks');

    navToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const isOpen = navLinks.classList.toggle('open');
      navToggle.classList.toggle('active');
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', isOpen);
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', isOpen ? 'Men√º schlie√üen' : 'Men√º √∂ffnen');
      document.body.style.overflow = isOpen ? 'hidden' : '';
    });

    // Close mobile menu on link click
    navLinks.querySelectorAll('a').forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', () => {
        navLinks.classList.remove('open');
        navToggle.classList.remove('active');
        navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
        navToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Men√º √∂ffnen');
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
      });
    });

    // Scroll reveal animation with IntersectionObserver
    const revealElements = document.querySelectorAll('.reveal');
    const revealObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          entry.target.classList.add('visible');
          revealObserver.unobserve(entry.target);
        }
      });
    }, {
      threshold: 0.12,
      rootMargin: '0px 0px -40px 0px'
    });

    revealElements.forEach(el => revealObserver.observe(el));

    // Stagger animation for cards in the same row
    document.querySelectorAll('.features, .board-grid').forEach(grid => {
      const cards = grid.querySelectorAll('.reveal');
      cards.forEach((card, i) => {
        card.style.transitionDelay = `${i * 0.1}s`;
      });
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="de">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>BOS-ARSA ‚Äî Amateurfunk im Dienst der Sicherheit</title>
  <meta name="description" content="√ñsterreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Beh√∂rden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben ‚Äì BOS-Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria">
  <meta property="og:title" content="BOS-ARSA ‚Äî Amateurfunk im Dienst der Sicherheit">
  <meta property="og:description" content="Der √∂sterreichische Amateurfunkverein der Beh√∂rden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben.">
  <meta property="og:type" content="website">
  <meta property="og:url" content="https://bos-arsa.at/">
  <meta property="og:locale" content="de_AT">
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Barlow+Condensed:wght@400;600;700;800&family=Source+Sans+3:wght@300;400;500;600;700&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
  <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest"></script>
  <style>
    /* ===== CSS Reset & Custom Properties ===== */
    *, *::before, *::after {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    :root {
      --bos-navy:        #0A1628;
      --bos-blue:        #003DA5;
      --bos-blue-light:  #1A5FC7;
      --bos-blue-bright: #2E7DE6;
      --bos-silver:      #C0C8D4;
      --bos-gold:        #C9A84C;
      --bos-white:       #F0F2F5;
      --bos-red:         #CC2936;
      --bos-dark:        #0D1B2A;
      --bos-gray:        #374151;

      --font-display: 'Barlow Condensed', 'Arial Narrow', sans-serif;
      --font-body: 'Source Sans 3', 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif;
      --font-mono: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace;

      --container: 1200px;
      --nav-height: 64px;
    }

    html {
      scroll-behavior: smooth;
      scroll-padding-top: var(--nav-height);
    }

    body {
      font-family: var(--font-body);
      color: var(--bos-dark);
      background: var(--bos-white);
      line-height: 1.6;
      -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
      -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    }

    img {
      max-width: 100%;
      display: block;
    }

    a {
      color: var(--bos-blue-light);
      text-decoration: none;
      transition: color 0.2s;
    }

    a:hover {
      color: var(--bos-blue-bright);
    }

    a:focus-visible {
      outline: 2px solid var(--bos-blue-bright);
      outline-offset: 2px;
    }

    .container {
      max-width: var(--container);
      margin: 0 auto;
      padding: 0 24px;
    }

    /* ===== Section Divider ===== */
    .section-divider {
      width: 60px;
      height: 2px;
      background: var(--bos-gold);
      margin: 16px auto 0;
    }

    .section-divider--left {
      margin-left: 0;
    }

    /* ===== Scroll Animations ===== */
    .reveal {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(30px);
      transition: opacity 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.22, 1, 0.36, 1), transform 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.22, 1, 0.36, 1);
    }

    .reveal.visible {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0);
    }

    /* ===== Navigation ===== */
    .nav {
      position: fixed;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      z-index: 1000;
      background: var(--bos-navy);
      border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.1);
      height: var(--nav-height);
      transition: box-shadow 0.3s;
    }

    .nav.scrolled {
      box-shadow: 0 2px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
    }

    .nav__inner {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: space-between;
      height: 100%;
    }

    .nav__brand {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 10px;
      color: #fff;
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-weight: 800;
      font-size: 1.4rem;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      text-decoration: none;
    }

    .nav__brand:hover {
      color: #fff;
    }

    .nav__brand-icon {
      position: relative;
      width: 38px;
      height: 38px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bos-blue), var(--bos-blue-light));
      border: 1px solid var(--bos-gold);
      border-radius: 3px;
    }

    .nav__brand-icon i {
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .nav__links {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 8px;
      list-style: none;
    }

    .nav__links a {
      display: block;
      padding: 8px 14px;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      font-family: var(--font-body);
      font-size: 0.9rem;
      font-weight: 500;
      letter-spacing: 0.3px;
      transition: color 0.2s, background 0.2s;
      border-radius: 3px;
      text-decoration: none;
    }

    .nav__links a:hover,
    .nav__links a:focus-visible {
      color: #fff;
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
    }

    /* Hamburger */
    .nav__hamburger {
      display: none;
      flex-direction: column;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 5px;
      width: 36px;
      height: 36px;
      background: none;
      border: none;
      cursor: pointer;
      padding: 4px;
    }

    .nav__hamburger span {
      display: block;
      width: 100%;
      height: 2px;
      background: var(--bos-silver);
      transition: transform 0.3s, opacity 0.3s;
    }

    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(1) {
      transform: translateY(7px) rotate(45deg);
    }

    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(2) {
      opacity: 0;
    }

    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(3) {
      transform: translateY(-7px) rotate(-45deg);
    }

    /* ===== Hero Section ===== */
    .hero {
      position: relative;
      min-height: 100vh;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(160deg, var(--bos-navy) 0%, #0e2240 40%, var(--bos-blue) 100%);
      overflow: hidden;
      padding: calc(var(--nav-height) + 40px) 24px 80px;
    }

    /* Geometric grid pattern overlay */
    .hero__pattern {
      position: absolute;
      inset: 0;
      opacity: 0.04;
      background-image:
        linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px),
        linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px);
      background-size: 60px 60px;
    }

    /* Radio wave animation */
    .hero__waves {
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    .hero__wave {
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      left: 50%;
      width: 200px;
      height: 200px;
      margin-top: -100px;
      margin-left: -100px;
      border: 1px solid rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.15);
      border-radius: 50%;
      animation: wave-expand 4s ease-out infinite;
    }

    .hero__wave:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 1s; }
    .hero__wave:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 2s; }
    .hero__wave:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 3s; }

    @keyframes wave-expand {
      0% {
        width: 200px;
        height: 200px;
        margin-top: -100px;
        margin-left: -100px;
        opacity: 0.5;
      }
      100% {
        width: 1200px;
        height: 1200px;
        margin-top: -600px;
        margin-left: -600px;
        opacity: 0;
      }
    }

    .hero__content {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 2;
      text-align: center;
      max-width: 820px;
    }

    .hero__badge {
      display: inline-flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 8px;
      padding: 6px 16px;
      background: rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.12);
      border: 1px solid rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.25);
      border-radius: 3px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.78rem;
      letter-spacing: 2px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      margin-bottom: 28px;
    }

    .hero__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(2.4rem, 6vw, 4.2rem);
      font-weight: 800;
      color: #fff;
      line-height: 1.1;
      letter-spacing: -0.5px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .hero__title span {
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .hero__subtitle {
      font-size: clamp(1rem, 2vw, 1.2rem);
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      font-weight: 300;
      line-height: 1.6;
      max-width: 640px;
      margin: 0 auto 40px;
    }

    .hero__actions {
      display: flex;
      gap: 16px;
      justify-content: center;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
    }

    /* ===== Buttons ===== */
    .btn {
      display: inline-flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 8px;
      padding: 14px 32px;
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      border: 2px solid transparent;
      border-radius: 3px;
      cursor: pointer;
      transition: all 0.25s;
      text-decoration: none;
    }

    .btn:focus-visible {
      outline: 2px solid var(--bos-blue-bright);
      outline-offset: 2px;
    }

    .btn--primary {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bos-gold), #d4b35a);
      color: var(--bos-navy);
      border-color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .btn--primary:hover {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #d4b35a, #dfc06e);
      color: var(--bos-navy);
      transform: translateY(-2px);
      box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.3);
    }

    .btn--outline {
      background: transparent;
      color: #fff;
      border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    }

    .btn--outline:hover {
      border-color: #fff;
      color: #fff;
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
      transform: translateY(-2px);
    }

    .btn--blue {
      background: var(--bos-blue-light);
      color: #fff;
      border-color: var(--bos-blue-light);
    }

    .btn--blue:hover {
      background: var(--bos-blue-bright);
      border-color: var(--bos-blue-bright);
      color: #fff;
      transform: translateY(-2px);
      box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(46, 125, 230, 0.3);
    }

    /* ===== Section Shared Styles ===== */
    .section {
      padding: 100px 0;
    }

    .section--dark {
      background: linear-gradient(160deg, var(--bos-dark), var(--bos-navy));
      color: #fff;
    }

    .section__header {
      text-align: center;
      margin-bottom: 64px;
    }

    .section__label {
      display: inline-block;
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.78rem;
      letter-spacing: 3px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      margin-bottom: 12px;
    }

    .section__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(1.8rem, 4vw, 2.6rem);
      font-weight: 800;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      line-height: 1.15;
    }

    .section--dark .section__title {
      color: #fff;
    }

    .section__intro {
      max-width: 700px;
      margin: 24px auto 0;
      color: var(--bos-gray);
      font-size: 1.08rem;
      line-height: 1.7;
      text-align: center;
    }

    .section--dark .section__intro {
      color: var(--bos-silver);
    }

    /* ===== About / Feature Cards ===== */
    .features {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
      gap: 28px;
    }

    .feature-card {
      background: #fff;
      border: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.4);
      border-radius: 4px;
      padding: 40px 32px;
      transition: transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s, border-color 0.3s;
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .feature-card::before {
      content: '';
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      height: 3px;
      background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--bos-blue), var(--bos-blue-bright));
      transform: scaleX(0);
      transform-origin: left;
      transition: transform 0.4s;
    }

    .feature-card:hover {
      transform: translateY(-4px);
      box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(10, 22, 40, 0.1), 0 0 0 1px rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.1);
      border-color: rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.2);
    }

    .feature-card:hover::before {
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }

    .feature-card__icon {
      width: 52px;
      height: 52px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 61, 165, 0.08), rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.08));
      border-radius: 4px;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      color: var(--bos-blue);
    }

    .feature-card__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1.3rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
      color: var(--bos-dark);
    }

    .feature-card__text {
      color: var(--bos-gray);
      font-size: 0.95rem;
      line-height: 1.65;
    }

    /* ===== Board / Vorstand Section ===== */
    .board-grid {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
      gap: 24px;
    }

    .board-card {
      background: #fff;
      border: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.4);
      border-radius: 4px;
      padding: 32px 28px;
      text-align: center;
      transition: transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;
      position: relative;
    }

    .board-card:hover {
      transform: translateY(-3px);
      box-shadow: 0 6px 24px rgba(10, 22, 40, 0.08);
    }

    .board-card--president {
      border-color: rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.3);
      background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.04), #fff);
    }

    .board-card__avatar {
      width: 64px;
      height: 64px;
      margin: 0 auto 18px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 61, 165, 0.06), rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.08));
      border-radius: 50%;
      color: var(--bos-blue);
    }

    .board-card--president .board-card__avatar {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.1), rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.15));
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      border: 2px solid rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.25);
    }

    .board-card__role {
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.72rem;
      letter-spacing: 2px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      margin-bottom: 8px;
      font-weight: 500;
    }

    .board-card__name {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1.2rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      color: var(--bos-dark);
      line-height: 1.3;
    }

    .board-card__credentials {
      font-size: 0.82rem;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      margin-top: 4px;
    }

    /* ===== Goals / Ziele Section ===== */
    .goals-content {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
      gap: 60px;
      align-items: center;
    }

    .goals__statement {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(1.4rem, 3vw, 1.9rem);
      font-weight: 700;
      color: #fff;
      line-height: 1.35;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 0.3px;
    }

    .goals__statement span {
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .goals-list {
      list-style: none;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 20px;
    }

    .goals-list__item {
      display: flex;
      align-items: flex-start;
      gap: 16px;
      padding: 20px;
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
      border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
      border-radius: 4px;
      transition: background 0.3s;
    }

    .goals-list__item:hover {
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.07);
    }

    .goals-list__icon {
      flex-shrink: 0;
      width: 40px;
      height: 40px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.1);
      border-radius: 4px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .goals-list__text {
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      font-size: 0.98rem;
      line-height: 1.55;
      padding-top: 8px;
    }

    /* ===== Join / Mitglied werden ===== */
    .join {
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .join__bg-accent {
      position: absolute;
      top: -50%;
      right: -20%;
      width: 600px;
      height: 600px;
      background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.06) 0%, transparent 70%);
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    .join-content {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
      gap: 60px;
      align-items: center;
      position: relative;
    }

    .join__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(1.8rem, 4vw, 2.4rem);
      font-weight: 800;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      color: var(--bos-dark);
      margin-bottom: 16px;
      line-height: 1.15;
    }

    .join__subtitle {
      color: var(--bos-gray);
      font-size: 1.08rem;
      line-height: 1.7;
      margin-bottom: 32px;
    }

    .join__requirements {
      list-style: none;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 14px;
      margin-bottom: 36px;
    }

    .join__requirement {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 12px;
      font-size: 0.98rem;
      color: var(--bos-gray);
    }

    .join__requirement i {
      color: var(--bos-blue-light);
      flex-shrink: 0;
    }

    .join__visual {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
    }

    .join__graphic {
      width: 100%;
      max-width: 400px;
      aspect-ratio: 1;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bos-navy), var(--bos-blue));
      border-radius: 4px;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 20px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .join__graphic::before {
      content: '';
      position: absolute;
      inset: 0;
      opacity: 0.05;
      background-image:
        linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px),
        linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px);
      background-size: 40px 40px;
    }

    .join__graphic-icon {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 1;
    }

    .join__graphic-text {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 1;
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1.4rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 2px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .join__graphic-sub {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 1;
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.78rem;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      letter-spacing: 1px;
    }

    /* ===== Partners ===== */
    .partners {
      background: #fff;
      border-top: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.3);
      border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.3);
    }

    .partners__label {

      color: var(--bos-silver);

    .footer__bottom {

      align-items: center;

        <ul class="goals-list reveal">

              <i data-lucide="radio" style="width:20px;height:20px;"></i>

    <div class="container">
      <div class="footer__inner">
        <div>
          <div class="footer__brand">

            </span>
            BOS-ARSA
          </div>
          <p class="footer__org-name">√ñsterreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Beh√∂rden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben ‚Äì BOS-Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria (BOS-ARSA)</p>
          <div class="footer__details">
            c/o Wolfgang Gabrutsch<br>
            9020 Klagenfurt am W√∂rthersee, Buchengasse 3<br><br>
            Zust√§ndige Vereinsbeh√∂rde: Landespolizeidirektion K√§rnten<br>
            ZVR-Zahl: 1783847541<br><br>
            <a href="mailto:office@bos-arsa.at">office@bos-arsa.at</a>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div>
          <div class="footer__links-title">Navigation</div>
          <ul class="footer__link-list">
            <li><a href="#ueber-uns">√úber uns</a></li>
            <li><a href="#vorstand">Vorstand</a></li>
            <li><a href="#ziele">Ziele</a></li>
            <li><a href="#mitglied">Mitglied werden</a></li>
            <li><a href="mailto:office@bos-arsa.at">Kontakt</a></li>
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="footer__bottom">
        <span>© 2025 BOS-ARSA. Alle Rechte vorbehalten.</span>
        <span>Amateurfunk im Dienst der Sicherheit</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </footer>

  <!-- ===== JavaScript ===== -->
  <script>
    // Initialize Lucide icons
    lucide.createIcons();

    // Sticky nav shadow on scroll
    const nav = document.getElementById('nav');
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      nav.classList.toggle('scrolled', window.scrollY > 20);
    }, { passive: true });

    // Mobile menu toggle
    const navToggle = document.getElementById('navToggle');
    const navLinks = document.getElementById('navLinks');

    navToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const isOpen = navLinks.classList.toggle('open');
      navToggle.classList.toggle('active');
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', isOpen);
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', isOpen ? 'Men√º schlie√üen' : 'Men√º √∂ffnen');
      document.body.style.overflow = isOpen ? 'hidden' : '';
    });

    // Close mobile menu on link click
    navLinks.querySelectorAll('a').forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', () => {
        navLinks.classList.remove('open');
        navToggle.classList.remove('active');
        navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
        navToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Men√º √∂ffnen');
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
      });
    });

    // Scroll reveal animation with IntersectionObserver
    const revealElements = document.querySelectorAll('.reveal');
    const revealObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          entry.target.classList.add('visible');
          revealObserver.unobserve(entry.target);
        }
      });
    }, {
      threshold: 0.12,
      rootMargin: '0px 0px -40px 0px'
    });

    revealElements.forEach(el => revealObserver.observe(el));

    // Stagger animation for cards in the same row
    document.querySelectorAll('.features, .board-grid').forEach(grid => {
      const cards = grid.querySelectorAll('.reveal');
      cards.forEach((card, i) => {
        card.style.transitionDelay = `${i * 0.1}s`;
      });
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>

content.text:
The `index.html` file has been created at `/home/achildrenmile/bosarsa/index.html`. Here's what's included:

**Structure** ‚Äî All 8 sections as specified:
1. Sticky navigation with hamburger menu on mobile
2. Full-viewport hero with animated radio wave concentric circles + geometric grid overlay
3. "√úber uns" with 3 feature cards (Sicherheit, Vernetzung, Ausbildung)
4. "Vorstand" ‚Äî 6 board member cards with gold accent for the president
5. "Ziele" ‚Äî dark section with statement + icon list of objectives
6. "Mitglied werden" ‚Äî requirements list + CTA mailto button + decorative graphic
7. "Partner" ‚Äî safeREACH.com + BOS-ARSA Logging Tool links
8. Footer with full Impressum, ZVR number, and navigation

**Design details:**
- Police blue color palette with gold accents throughout
- Barlow Condensed for headlines, Source Sans 3 for body, JetBrains Mono for labels
- CSS radio wave pulse animation in the hero (expanding gold circles)
- Geometric grid pattern overlays for tactical/operations feel
- Card hover effects with blue top-border reveal and subtle glow
- Scroll-triggered fade-up animations via IntersectionObserver with staggered delays
- Gold line dividers between section headers

**Responsive:** 3-col ‚Üí 2-col ‚Üí 1-col grid breakpoints, mobile hamburger menu with slide-in panel

**Accessibility:** Proper heading hierarchy (h1‚Üíh3), ARIA labels/roles on nav, sufficient contrast ratios, focus-visible states, semantic HTML

The file is fully self-contained ‚Äî just open it in a browser or deploy to any static host.

content.content:
# Image URLs and Design Elements from bos-arsa.at

## Image URLs Found

1. **Logo/Main Image:**
   - `https://bosarsa.wordpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/bos.png?w=1024`

2. **Supporting Images:**
   - `https://bosarsa.wordpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/shutterstock_744004981.jpg?w=750`
   - `https://bosarsa.wordpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/shutterstock_496840360.jpg?w=750`
   - `https://bosarsa.wordpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/shutterstock_187609625.jpg?w=750`
   - `https://bosarsa.wordpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/bos-arsa.png?w=308`

## Primary Color Palette

The site employs a sophisticated neutral scheme:

- **Background:** `#f9f9f9` (off-white)
- **Text/Contrast:** `#111111` (near-black)
- **Secondary Contrast:** `#636363` (medium gray)
- **Accent Colors:**
  - `#cfcabe` (warm taupe)
  - `#c2a990` (muted tan)
  - `#d8613c` (rust orange)
  - `#b1c5a4` (sage green)

      color: var(--bos-blue-light);
      text-decoration: none;
      transition: color 0.2s;
    }

    a:hover {
      color: var(--bos-blue-bright);
    }

    a:focus-visible {
      outline: 2px solid var(--bos-blue-bright);
      outline-offset: 2px;
    }

    .container {
      max-width: var(--container);
      margin: 0 auto;
      padding: 0 24px;
    }

    /* ===== Section Divider ===== */
    .section-divider {
      width: 60px;
      height: 2px;
      background: var(--bos-gold);
      margin: 16px auto 0;
    }

    .section-divider--left {
      margin-left: 0;
    }

    /* ===== Scroll Animations ===== */
    .reveal {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(30px);
      transition: opacity 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.22, 1, 0.36, 1), transform 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.22, 1, 0.36, 1);
    }

    .reveal.visible {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0);
    }

    /* ===== Navigation ===== */
    .nav {
      position: fixed;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      z-index: 1000;
      background: var(--bos-navy);
      border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.1);
      height: var(--nav-height);
      transition: box-shadow 0.3s;
    }

    .nav.scrolled {
      box-shadow: 0 2px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
    }

    .nav__inner {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: space-between;
      height: 100%;
    }

    .nav__brand {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 10px;
      color: #fff;
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-weight: 800;
      font-size: 1.4rem;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      text-decoration: none;
    }

    .nav__brand:hover {
      color: #fff;
    }

    .nav__brand-icon {
      position: relative;
      width: 38px;
      height: 38px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bos-blue), var(--bos-blue-light));
      border: 1px solid var(--bos-gold);
      border-radius: 3px;
    }

    .nav__brand-icon i {
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .nav__links {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 8px;
      list-style: none;
    }

    .nav__links a {
      display: block;
      padding: 8px 14px;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      font-family: var(--font-body);
      font-size: 0.9rem;
      font-weight: 500;
      letter-spacing: 0.3px;
      transition: color 0.2s, background 0.2s;
      border-radius: 3px;
      text-decoration: none;
    }

    .nav__links a:hover,
    .nav__links a:focus-visible {
      color: #fff;
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
    }

    /* Hamburger */
    .nav__hamburger {
      display: none;
      flex-direction: column;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 5px;
      width: 36px;
      height: 36px;
      background: none;
      border: none;
      cursor: pointer;
      padding: 4px;
    }

    .nav__hamburger span {
      display: block;
      width: 100%;
      height: 2px;
      background: var(--bos-silver);
      transition: transform 0.3s, opacity 0.3s;
    }

    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(1) {
      transform: translateY(7px) rotate(45deg);
    }

    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(2) {
      opacity: 0;
    }

    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(3) {
      transform: translateY(-7px) rotate(-45deg);
    }

    /* ===== Hero Section ===== */
    .hero {
      position: relative;
      min-height: 100vh;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(160deg, var(--bos-navy) 0%, #0e2240 40%, var(--bos-blue) 100%);
      overflow: hidden;
      padding: calc(var(--nav-height) + 40px) 24px 80px;
    }

    /* Geometric grid pattern overlay */
    .hero__pattern {
      position: absolute;
      inset: 0;
      opacity: 0.04;
      background-image:
        linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px),
        linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px);
      background-size: 60px 60px;
    }

    /* Radio wave animation */
    .hero__waves {
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    .hero__wave {
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      left: 50%;
      width: 200px;
      height: 200px;
      margin-top: -100px;
      margin-left: -100px;
      border: 1px solid rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.15);
      border-radius: 50%;
      animation: wave-expand 4s ease-out infinite;
    }

    .hero__wave:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 1s; }
    .hero__wave:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 2s; }
    .hero__wave:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 3s; }

    @keyframes wave-expand {
      0% {
        width: 200px;
        height: 200px;
        margin-top: -100px;
        margin-left: -100px;
        opacity: 0.5;
      }
      100% {
        width: 1200px;
        height: 1200px;
        margin-top: -600px;
        margin-left: -600px;
        opacity: 0;
      }
    }

    .hero__content {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 2;
      text-align: center;
      max-width: 820px;
    }

    .hero__badge {
      display: inline-flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 8px;
      padding: 6px 16px;
      background: rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.12);
      border: 1px solid rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.25);
      border-radius: 3px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.78rem;
      letter-spacing: 2px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      margin-bottom: 28px;
    }

    .hero__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(2.4rem, 6vw, 4.2rem);
      font-weight: 800;
      color: #fff;
      line-height: 1.1;
      letter-spacing: -0.5px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .hero__title span {
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .hero__subtitle {
      font-size: clamp(1rem, 2vw, 1.2rem);
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      font-weight: 300;
      line-height: 1.6;
      max-width: 640px;
      margin: 0 auto 40px;
    }

    .hero__actions {
      display: flex;
      gap: 16px;
      justify-content: center;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
    }

    /* ===== Buttons ===== */
    .btn {
      display: inline-flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 8px;
      padding: 14px 32px;
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      border: 2px solid transparent;
      border-radius: 3px;
      cursor: pointer;
      transition: all 0.25s;
      text-decoration: none;
    }

    .btn:focus-visible {
      outline: 2px solid var(--bos-blue-bright);
      outline-offset: 2px;
    }

    .btn--primary {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bos-gold), #d4b35a);
      color: var(--bos-navy);
      border-color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .btn--primary:hover {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #d4b35a, #dfc06e);
      color: var(--bos-navy);
      transform: translateY(-2px);
      box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.3);
    }

    .btn--outline {
      background: transparent;
      color: #fff;
      border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    }

    .btn--outline:hover {
      border-color: #fff;
      color: #fff;
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
      transform: translateY(-2px);
    }

    .btn--blue {
      background: var(--bos-blue-light);
      color: #fff;
      border-color: var(--bos-blue-light);
    }

    .btn--blue:hover {
      background: var(--bos-blue-bright);
      border-color: var(--bos-blue-bright);
      color: #fff;
      transform: translateY(-2px);
      box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(46, 125, 230, 0.3);
    }

    /* ===== Section Shared Styles ===== */
    .section {
      padding: 100px 0;
    }

    .section--dark {
      background: linear-gradient(160deg, var(--bos-dark), var(--bos-navy));
      color: #fff;
    }

    .section__header {
      text-align: center;
      margin-bottom: 64px;
    }

    .section__label {
      display: inline-block;
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.78rem;
      letter-spacing: 3px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      margin-bottom: 12px;
    }

    .section__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(1.8rem, 4vw, 2.6rem);
      font-weight: 800;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      line-height: 1.15;
    }

    .section--dark .section__title {
      color: #fff;
    }

    .section__intro {
      max-width: 700px;
      margin: 24px auto 0;
      color: var(--bos-gray);
      font-size: 1.08rem;
      line-height: 1.7;
      text-align: center;
    }

    .section--dark .section__intro {
      color: var(--bos-silver);
    }

    /* ===== About / Feature Cards ===== */
    .features {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
      gap: 28px;
    }

    .feature-card {
      background: #fff;
      border: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.4);
      border-radius: 4px;
      padding: 40px 32px;
      transition: transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s, border-color 0.3s;
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .feature-card::before {
      content: '';
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      height: 3px;
      background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--bos-blue), var(--bos-blue-bright));
      transform: scaleX(0);
      transform-origin: left;
      transition: transform 0.4s;
    }

    .feature-card:hover {
      transform: translateY(-4px);
      box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(10, 22, 40, 0.1), 0 0 0 1px rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.1);
      border-color: rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.2);
    }

    .feature-card:hover::before {
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }

    .feature-card__icon {
      width: 52px;
      height: 52px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 61, 165, 0.08), rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.08));
      border-radius: 4px;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      color: var(--bos-blue);
    }

    .feature-card__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1.3rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
      color: var(--bos-dark);
    }

    .feature-card__text {
      color: var(--bos-gray);
      font-size: 0.95rem;
      line-height: 1.65;
    }

    /* ===== Board / Vorstand Section ===== */
    .board-grid {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
      gap: 24px;
    }

    .board-card {
      background: #fff;
      border: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.4);
      border-radius: 4px;
      padding: 32px 28px;
      text-align: center;
      transition: transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;
      position: relative;
    }

    .board-card:hover {
      transform: translateY(-3px);
      box-shadow: 0 6px 24px rgba(10, 22, 40, 0.08);
    }

    .board-card--president {
      border-color: rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.3);
      background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.04), #fff);
    }

    .board-card__avatar {
      width: 64px;
      height: 64px;
      margin: 0 auto 18px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 61, 165, 0.06), rgba(26, 95, 199, 0.08));
      border-radius: 50%;
      color: var(--bos-blue);
    }

    .board-card--president .board-card__avatar {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.1), rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.15));
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      border: 2px solid rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.25);
    }

    .board-card__role {
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.72rem;
      letter-spacing: 2px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      margin-bottom: 8px;
      font-weight: 500;
    }

    .board-card__name {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1.2rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      color: var(--bos-dark);
      line-height: 1.3;
    }

    .board-card__credentials {
      font-size: 0.82rem;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      margin-top: 4px;
    }

    /* ===== Goals / Ziele Section ===== */
    .goals-content {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
      gap: 60px;
      align-items: center;
    }

    .goals__statement {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(1.4rem, 3vw, 1.9rem);
      font-weight: 700;
      color: #fff;
      line-height: 1.35;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 0.3px;
    }

    .goals__statement span {
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .goals-list {
      list-style: none;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 20px;
    }

    .goals-list__item {
      display: flex;
      align-items: flex-start;
      gap: 16px;
      padding: 20px;
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
      border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
      border-radius: 4px;
      transition: background 0.3s;
    }

    .goals-list__item:hover {
      background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.07);
    }

    .goals-list__icon {
      flex-shrink: 0;
      width: 40px;
      height: 40px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.1);
      border-radius: 4px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .goals-list__text {
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      font-size: 0.98rem;
      line-height: 1.55;
      padding-top: 8px;
    }

    /* ===== Join / Mitglied werden ===== */
    .join {
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .join__bg-accent {
      position: absolute;
      top: -50%;
      right: -20%;
      width: 600px;
      height: 600px;
      background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(201, 168, 76, 0.06) 0%, transparent 70%);
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    .join-content {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
      gap: 60px;
      align-items: center;
      position: relative;
    }

    .join__title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: clamp(1.8rem, 4vw, 2.4rem);
      font-weight: 800;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      color: var(--bos-dark);
      margin-bottom: 16px;
      line-height: 1.15;
    }

    .join__subtitle {
      color: var(--bos-gray);
      font-size: 1.08rem;
      line-height: 1.7;
      margin-bottom: 32px;
    }

    .join__requirements {
      list-style: none;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 14px;
      margin-bottom: 36px;
    }

    .join__requirement {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 12px;
      font-size: 0.98rem;
      color: var(--bos-gray);
    }

    .join__requirement i {
      color: var(--bos-blue-light);
      flex-shrink: 0;
    }

    .join__visual {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
    }

    .join__graphic {
      width: 100%;
      max-width: 400px;
      aspect-ratio: 1;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bos-navy), var(--bos-blue));
      border-radius: 4px;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 20px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .join__graphic::before {
      content: '';
      position: absolute;
      inset: 0;
      opacity: 0.05;
      background-image:
        linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px),
        linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px);
      background-size: 40px 40px;
    }

    .join__graphic-icon {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 1;
    }

    .join__graphic-text {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 1;
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-size: 1.4rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 2px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .join__graphic-sub {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 1;
      font-family: var(--font-mono);
      font-size: 0.78rem;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      letter-spacing: 1px;
    }

    /* ===== Partners ===== */
    .partners {
      background: #fff;
      border-top: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.3);
      border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.3);
    }

    .partners__label {
      text-align: center;
      font-size: 0.9rem;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      margin-bottom: 32px;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    }

    .partners-grid {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 48px;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
    }

    .partner-item {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 10px;
      padding: 24px 36px;
      border: 1px solid rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.3);
      border-radius: 4px;
      text-decoration: none;
      color: var(--bos-gray);
      transition: border-color 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;
    }

    .partner-item:hover {
      border-color: var(--bos-blue-light);
      box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(10, 22, 40, 0.06);
      color: var(--bos-blue);
    }

    .partner-item__name {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-weight: 700;
      font-size: 1.15rem;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      text-transform: uppercase;
    }

    .partner-item__desc {
      font-size: 0.82rem;
      color: var(--bos-silver);
    }

    /* ===== Footer ===== */
    .footer {
      background: var(--bos-navy);
      color: var(--bos-silver);
      padding: 64px 0 0;
    }

    .footer__inner {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: 2fr 1fr;
      gap: 48px;
    }

    .footer__brand {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-weight: 800;
      font-size: 1.2rem;
      color: #fff;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 10px;
    }

    .footer__brand-icon {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .footer__org-name {
      font-size: 0.88rem;
      line-height: 1.65;
      color: rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.7);
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .footer__details {
      font-size: 0.85rem;
      line-height: 1.8;
      color: rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.6);
    }

    .footer__details a {
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }

    .footer__details a:hover {
      color: #d4b35a;
    }

    .footer__links-title {
      font-family: var(--font-display);
      font-weight: 700;
      font-size: 0.95rem;
      color: #fff;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .footer__link-list {
      list-style: none;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 10px;
    }

    .footer__link-list a {
      color: rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.6);
      font-size: 0.88rem;
      transition: color 0.2s;
    }

    .footer__link-list a:hover {
      color: #fff;
    }

    .footer__bottom {
      margin-top: 48px;
      padding: 20px 0;
      border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: space-between;
      font-size: 0.8rem;
      color: rgba(192, 200, 212, 0.4);
    }

    /* ===== Mobile Responsive ===== */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
      .features {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
      }

      .board-grid {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
      }

      .goals-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        gap: 40px;
      }

      .goals__statement {
        text-align: center;
      }

      .join-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        gap: 40px;
      }

      .join__visual {
        order: -1;
      }

      .join__graphic {
        max-width: 320px;
        aspect-ratio: 4/3;
      }

      .footer__inner {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
      }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
      :root {
        --nav-height: 56px;
      }

      .nav__links {
        position: fixed;
        top: var(--nav-height);
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        background: var(--bos-navy);
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: stretch;
        padding: 24px;
        gap: 4px;
        transform: translateX(100%);
        transition: transform 0.35s cubic-bezier(0.22, 1, 0.36, 1);
        overflow-y: auto;
      }

      .nav__links.open {
        transform: translateX(0);
      }

      .nav__links a {
        font-size: 1.05rem;
        padding: 14px 16px;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
      }

      .nav__hamburger {
        display: flex;
      }

      .features {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
      }

      .board-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
      }

      .section {

        <ul class="goals-list reveal">

  <!-- ===== Mitglied werden ===== -->
  <section class="section join" id="mitglied">

  <footer class="footer" id="kontakt">
    <div class="container">

            BOS-ARSA
          </div>
          <p class="footer__org-name">√ñsterreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Beh√∂rden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben ‚Äì BOS-Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria (BOS-ARSA)</p>
          <div class="footer__details">
            c/o Wolfgang Gabrutsch<br>
            9020 Klagenfurt am W√∂rthersee, Buchengasse 3<br><br>
            Zust√§ndige Vereinsbeh√∂rde: Landespolizeidirektion K√§rnten<br>
            ZVR-Zahl: 1783847541<br><br>
